The REWIRE Difference

REWIRE by Cognixia is designed to help organizations upskill/elevate their workforce. Learning programs are tailored to each company's specific needs and are constantly updated to ensure organizations are future-proofing their workforce with the latest technologies.

Tailored training

We customize our programming to support your talent needs and business ambitions, whether you’re building out AI, your cloud computing capabilities or investing in machine learning.

Hands-On Consultation

We go beyond coursework, working closely with our clients to develop a talent blueprint for the next 12 months or more.

Expert Network

Our trainers are industry veterans who bring practical, real-world experience in the latest technologies to your employees.

Continual Learning

Because we understand that learning is a lifelong pursuit, we create opportunities to develop new skills at every career stage and technical skill level.
